item.title: By: MartinG
item.dc:creator: MartinG
item.description:
I assume you're referring specifically to laptop-glued seat-hogs (who always sit at a two-seat table, not at on of those stools by the window), and not to us general coffee-drinking individuals?
Or has the Seattle counter-coffee-culture backlash finally begun? Vive la revolucion...
item.content:encoded:
I assume you’re referring specifically to laptop-glued seat-hogs (who always sit at a two-seat table, not at on of those stools by the window), and not to us general coffee-drinking individuals?

Or has the Seattle counter-coffee-culture backlash finally begun? Vive la revolucion…
